name: Escaping
note:
<Category: Escaping>
<Custom Turn End Effect>
//Loop through all states
  var blocked = 0;
  var states = user.states();
  for (var i = 0; i < states.length; ++i) {
    var checkState = states[i];
    // Check if currently loop state exists and if the state is categorized as a Positive Status
    if (checkState && checkState.category.contains('CANNOT ESCAPE')) {
      blocked = 1;
    }
  }
//Test Speed
if (blocked == 0) {
var esc = 0.5 * $gameParty.agility() / $gameTroop.agility();
esc = Math.max(0.1,Math.min(0.8,esc));
var success = (Math.random() < esc);
if (user.isActor()) {
blocked = success ? 0 : 2;
} else {
blocked = success ? 2 : 0;
}
}
if (blocked == 0) {
if(BattleManager.isNetworkBattlePvP()) {
BattleManager._forceEndPvP();
} else {
if (user.isActor()) {
    BattleManager._abortBattleCommandFromNetwork();
} else {
user.escape();
}
}
} else if (blocked == 1) {
   SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("Escape was stopped!");
} else {
   SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("Failed to escape!");
}
user.removeState(11);
</Custom Turn End Effect>

name: Evade
note:
<Category: Evasive Status>
<Custom Select Effect>
if (this.item() && this.isForOpponent()) {
    this._formerItemSuccessRate = this.item().successRate;
    this.item().successRate = 0;
}
</Custom Select Effect>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
// Check if there is a success rate stored.
if (this._formerItemSuccessRate !== undefined) {
  // Restore the skill's success rate.
  this.item().successRate = this._formerItemSuccessRate;
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

name: Time Frozen
note:
<Category: Cannot Escape>
<Custom Select Effect>
// Get the current skill
var skill = this.item();
// Check if the skill exists and can deal critical damage
if (skill && skill.damage.critical) {
  // Get the previous Critical Hit settings
  this._prevForcedCriticalHit = $gameSystem._forceCritical;
  this._prevForcedNoCriticalHit = $gameSystem._forceNoCritical;
  // Force the hit to be a critical hit
  BattleManager.actionForceCritical();
}
</Custom Select Effect>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
// Check if the previous settings exist
if (this._prevForcedCriticalHit !== undefined) {
  // Revert the Critical Hit settings to what they were before
  $gameSystem._forceCritical = this._prevForcedCriticalHit;
  $gameSystem._forceNoCritical = this._prevForcedNoCriticalHit;
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

dmg = Math.max(1,Math.round(a.mat/10));
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("A spear of light fires out!");

}

name: download()
note:
<Category: On Battle Start>

<Custom Battle Effect>
var foe = user.isActor() ? $gameTroop.rival() : $gameParty.leader();
if (foe.def > foe.mdf) {
user.addBuff(4,3);
} else {
user.addBuff(2,3);
} 
if (foe.mat > foe.atk ) {
user.addBuff(5,3);
} else {
user.addBuff(3,3);
} 
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText(user.name() + "'s Download complete!")
</Custom Battle Effect>

name: Venom
note:
<Category: Negative Status>
<Custom Apply Effect>
target._venom = Math.round(origin.mat * 0.1);
target._venom = Math.max(1, target._venom);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Remove Effect>
// Remove the damage effect.
target._venom = undefined;
</Custom Remove Effect>

<Custom Regenerate Effect>
// Default the DoT formula.
target._venom = target._venom || Math.round(origin.mat * 0.1);
target._venom = Math.max(1, target._venom);
// Play an animation on the target.
target.startAnimation(59);
// Reduce the target's HP
target.gainHp(-target._venom);
// Start the damage popup.
target.startDamagePopup();
// Check if the target is dead.
if (target.isDead()) {
  // Make the target collapse.
  target.performCollapse();
}
// Clear the target's results.
target.clearResult();
</Custom Regenerate Effect>

name: Undying Cancer
note:
<Custom Battle Effect>
a._undcan = 0;
</Custom Battle Effect>

<Category: Bypass Death Removal>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
// Check if the target's HP is 0 or is currently in the death state.
if (target._undcan == 0 && target.tp >= 100) {
if (target.hp <= 0 || target.isDead()) {
  // Play the auto-life animation on target.
  target.startAnimation(49);
SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText("But that cancer refused to die!");
  // Set the amount of HP recovered to 10%.
  var rate = 0.10;
  var rate2 = target.tp > 100 ? ((target.tp-100)/2)/100 : 0.0;
  rate = rate + rate2;
  // Calculate the HP healed.
  var heal = Math.floor(target.mhp * rate);
  // Heal the target.
  target.gainHp(heal);
  // Make the damage popup show for the heal.
  target.startDamagePopup();
  // Clear the target's results.
  target.addBuff(2,10);
  target.addBuff(3,10);
  target.addBuff(4,10);
  target.addBuff(5,10);
  target.addBuff(7,10);
  target.clearResult();
  target._undcan = target.tp == 200 ? 0 : 1;
  target.clearTp();
}
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

name: Valasz
note:
<Custom Apply Effect>
user._memoryShield = user._memoryShield || [];
user.setStateCounter(stateId, user._memoryShield.length);
</Custom Apply Effect>

<Custom Select Effect>
target._memoryShield = target._memoryShield || [];
target.setStateCounter(stateId, target._memoryShield.length);
if (this.isSkill() && !this.isAttack() && this.isForOpponent()) {
  var skillId = this.item().id;
  if (target._memoryShield.contains(skillId)) {
    this._formerItemSuccessRateMS = this.item().successRate;
    this.item().successRate = 0;
    var skill = $dataSkills[skillId];
    var text = '\\c[4]\\i[' + skill.iconIndex + ']' + skill.name + '\\c[0] is useless against \\c[4]Valasz\\c[0] now!';
    SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText(text);
  } else {
    target._memoryShield.push(skillId);
    var skill = $dataSkills[skillId];
    var text = '\\c[4]\\i[' + skill.iconIndex + ']' + skill.name + '\\c[0] learned by \\c[4]Valasz\\c[0]!';
    var wait = 60;
    SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText(text);
    for (;;) {
      if (target._memoryShield.length > 2) {
        var skill = $dataSkills[target._memoryShield.shift()];
        target.startAnimation(5);
        text = '\\c[4]\\i[' + skill.iconIndex + ']' + skill.name + '\\c[0] was lost by \\c[4]Valasz\\c[0]!';
        SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText(text);
      } else {
        break;
      }
    }
  target.setStateCounter(stateId, target._memoryShield.length);
  }
} else if (this.isAttack() && target._memoryShield.length > 0) {
  var skill = $dataSkills[target._memoryShield.shift()];
  text = '\\c[4]\\i[' + skill.iconIndex + ']' + skill.name + '\\c[0] was lost by \\c[4]Valasz\\c[0]!';
  target.startAnimation(5);
  target.setStateCounter(stateId, target._memoryShield.length);
  var wait = 60;
  SceneManager._scene._logWindow.addText(text);
}
</Custom Select Effect>

<Custom Deselect Effect>
if (this._formerItemSuccessRate !== undefined) {
  this.item().successRate = this._formerItemSuccessRateMS;
}
</Custom Deselect Effect>

name: Mercurial

var elements = this.getItemElements();
//Check Through Each Type

//Neutral

user.removeStateCategoryAll('ELEMENT TYPE');
user.addState(sid);

name: Secace Eff
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
if (this.isAttack() || this.isAttackSkill()) {
var foes = !user.isActor() ? $gameParty.aliveMembers() : $gameTroop.aliveMembers();
for (var i = 0; i < foes.length; ++i) {
var foe = foes[i];
if (foe  && foe !== target) {
dmg = Math.round(value*0.5);
foe.gainHp(-dmg);
foe.startDamagePopup();
if (foe.isDead()) {
foe.performCollapse();
}
foe.clearResult();
foe.startAnimation(2);
}
}
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

}

    category = 'NEGATIVE STATUS';
    var count = 0;

    for (var i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
      var state = user.states()[i];
      if (!state) continue;
      if ((state.id != stateId) && state.category.contains(category.toUpperCase())) count += 1;

var n = count ? 0.08 : 0.04;

user.gainHp(value)

name: Ruyi Eff
note:
<Custom Establish Effect>
// Check if the attack is a physical attack that dealt HP damage from a critical hit.
if (target.result().critical) {

var allowedParams = [];
allowedParams.push(2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7);
// Make a copy of the pool
var result = allowedParams.slice();

  var param = result[Math.floor(Math.random() * result.length)];
  var turns = 3;

  user.addBuff(param, turns);
  // Check if target is alive.
  if (target.isAlive()) {

  
    var param = result[Math.floor(Math.random() * result.length)];
    var turns = 2;
    target.addDebuff(param, turns);
  }
}
</Custom Establish Effect>

// Check to see if any physical damage is dealt.
if (this.isAttack()) {
  // Rounds up the bonus damage and recoil damage.
  var dmg = Math.ceil(target.def*0.1);
  // Makes the attacker lose damage equal to the dmg variable.
  user.gainHp(-1 * dmg);
  // Check to see if the attacker is dead.
  if (user.isDead()) {
    // If the attacker is dead, make it collapse.
    user.performCollapse();
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>

  // The amount of points for the absorption barrier.
  var barrier = Math.round(target.mhp*0.4);
  // How many turns the barrier will last.
  var turns = 3;
  // Make the target gain barrier points for those turns.
  target.gainBarrier(barrier, turns);
  // Play an animation on the target.
  target.startAnimation(53);
  target.removeState(stateId);
}
</Custom Respond Effect>

}

name: Vioarr Eff
note:
<Custom Select Effect>
if (this.isForOpponent() && this.isHpEffect()) {

// Initialize the HP value.
var bst = 0;
// Loop through all 8 parameters.
for (var i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
  // If it is a debuff...
  if (user._buffs[i] != 0) {
    // Then increase the healing by a formula.
    bst += Math.abs(user._buffs[i]);
  }
}
boost = 0.03 * bst;
target.addState(100);
target._dmgreduc = target._dmgreduc || 0.0;
target._dmgreduc += boost;
}
</Custom Select Effect>
